parameters: So, you missed out on collecting the goblin's nose.
I wasn't originally enthusiastic about it.
Even if it's to confirm an extermination, bringing
back a part of the corpse is going too far.
That's precisely why experience is important.
Only by becoming stronger can we show those monsters
our pride in being bearers of civilization and
Well... You are free to have your own beliefs and
Anyway, the agreement was made. The contract was to
bring 10 pieces of Goblin's noses for 3G, right? \n< Guild master >
Since you didn't bring anything back, there
Hmph. Well, it's my own choice. I have no objections.
I wasn't counting on any reward from the beginning,
However, I prioritized extermination first and
foremost, and in the process, I also helped people.
Make sure to keep a proper record of the completion of
Well, normally we should record it as a failure...
Since there are witnesses this time, let's just call
it a success. This is unprecedented. To have a
So that makes it \V[2501] more requests until
If I complete \V[2501] more requests, you will issue a
travel permit to the eastern town.
No mistake about it. How many times have we had this
I'm in a hurry. No matter how many times I check, it
And then, take this with you.
Given to adventurers who have completed their first
job... well, it's more like an ID card.
Records and evaluations are also written here.
Is this the proof of my capability? Understood.
That's enough for today. I need to rest up for
Eat, take a bath, and sleep.
Oh, right. I also need a spare ring. I can't use the
Let's book an accommodation for now. Whatever I do,
I can do it after that.
Hey there, good morning. Have you gotten used to this
I came here yesterday. I'm neither used to
it nor unaccustomed to it yet.
The request isn't finished yet, right? Once you finish
Waitress? What is this request about?
Hey, hey. You don't seem to have gone to the tavern,
I tried going to a tavern the other day, but I didn't
I see... well, you don't have any use for them. You're
If you don't understand how things work, it may not be
a suitable job for you, miss.
In short, the request is to take the customer's order
and carry drinks and dishes to their table. It's a
request to help out at the store.
No one asked you to do it. If you don't like
it, you don't have to do it.
Hmm... but it does sound interesting. It's not a job
I'd ever have the chance to do if I stayed cooped up
in this mansion my whole life.
Moreover... Yes, that fluttery dress... It's a
little... nice. I wonder if I could wear that dress?
I don't know which outfit it is, but I think they'll
give you the uniform. I'm not sure if they have one
By the way, the reward is based on your performance.
It all depends on how much you can earn.
Very well. I accept this request. I will contact the
If that's the case, just take this paper as it is.
That way, the conversation will go smoothly.
I see. Then, I'll go now.
...Oh, my. I felt like when I first sent my
What, are you interested in such a job?
It's too rough to make sense regardless of whether it
What kind of request is this?
Let's see, this time it's... milking cows.
Farmers are always short of labor. That's why requests
like these keep coming in one after another.
And even the adventurers who take on requests are
If you're a beginner with no money to spare, this is
how you earn pocket change: by taking on these types
This is probably not a job that girls like you would
I'm used to handling livestock. It's our family
Well, I've never touched a cow before, but if they show
me the movements, I'm confident that I can handle it
Well, even if you say that... The reward is only 1G, but
are you really serious about taking it?
I will take the job. Although the compensation may be
small, the evaluation will likely be high.
It's a request that I've been hoping for right now.
Well, even if you fail, it's not like anyone will die.
Plus, the former farmers are all out.
Wouldn't it be better to do it today instead of
pushing it to tomorrow? Here, take this request
Should I show this to the client?
Ah, the client is doing some farm work in the field,
so if you show them that, they should guide you to their
Understood, it's the field. Then, I'll go now.
The request isn't finished yet, is it? Or did you come
to ask about how to use items during battle?
First, set the item you want to use in the slot. To do
so, open the menu and select the slot option.
Then you'll see the screen with the list of items
that can be registered. Choose the necessary
items and register them in the slots.
With this, preparation is complete. \n< Guild master >
During battle, use items from the slot. Select with
1-2 or L-R and activate the item's effect with the
Lately it's been a bit too frequent... I wonder if
some women have been captured somewhere. We also have
some missing persons here and there...
Do goblins really increase when women are captured?
Hmm... Ah... Well... What is it. That's just how it
Even though they are just a few goblins, women and
children can lose their lives if they come across
There's no better way than to quickly exterminate
them. The reward for success is 3G. Is it okay to
Of course. There is no reason to refuse. I will accept
By the way, miss, do you know how to use items during
Alright, I'll teach you briefly then.
During battles, use items from the slots. For
keyboard, press 1 or 2. For pad, select with L and R
and activate the item's effect with the slot use button.
There are two slots. Items that go into the slots must
be registered in advance from the menu screen.
To do it, just go to the slot item on the menu screen,
press the register button, and select the item.
Oh, of course, but you can't register without first
Items are sold at the tool shop. Be sure to buy one
If you skimp on things just because they're expensive,
you'll end up paying a higher price in the end.
I roughly understand. Thank you, Master.
I see. In that case, it seems alright. Come back
Don't you know the location? It's to the west.
Transporting goods to the Minotaur Forest
Transporting goods to the Minotaur Forest
This is Erika's request. The reward is 1G. \n< Guild master >
Could you deliver supplies and bento boxes to the
Is she leaving the supply to someone else? Does that

...Ricott, her big sister was killed by the Minotaur.
She searches for the enemy until her stamina is depleted,
then she sometimes descend to the town to take a short
break before returning to the forest.
There's no such thing as someone without
circumstances. Especially among those who call
You must be the same, Miss.
Don't get too deeply involved with it, huh?
That's just how adult relationships are.
The job is simply to transport goods. There should be
What amount of luggage do you have?
Just one small bag. It's probably just delivering
Understood. Then I will take it. Honestly, can't be
...Nevermind. Her camp is always in the same place.
The location is inside the western forest. I'll give
you a map, so please follow it.
This is the bag. I don't think I need to
worry about you, but don't handle it too roughly,
依頼　ミノタウロス捜索終了後
Why don't you play and laugh a little more? Try acting

I believe you saved a woman from goblins. She would like

I see. Please tell her not to worry about it.
Not very friendly, are you? A kid's products need
friendliness and charm. It's only now that they can be
Yeah... even if you say that, it's just a habit. I

In a small town like this, there weren't that many

Well, it's better than having a mountain of abandoned
This is not good for me. What should I do?
I'm afraid you'll just have to wait for this. But that

You know, the guild doesn't just issue requests as
Operating within the limits of the budget, processing

Oh well... Anyway, you can go home today. Or rather,
go and take a break, a hardworking girl
I see... So that's how it is. You were plotting
Well, nevermind. I've already completed one task

Anyway, it would be a lie to say that I wasn't curious
Understood. I'll allow you to stick your nose in my
But I want the request prepared by tomorrow.
Her house is on the south side of the town. Well, take
Honestly...everyone treats me like a child just
The request isn't finished yet, right? Once you finish

What... You don't know what an orc is? This is the

Well...just think of it as a Goblin who has grown into
adulthood in appearance. Even though the species is
It has a muscular and aggressive nature. It's an
extremely combative monster that prefers to attack
So, it seems that the orc scout is wandering around
this area. Please defeat it before things get serious,

Scout? Does that mean there's a main unit somewhere
I wonder. We don't understand the habits of monsters.
However, small groups appear before the big outbreak
I don't know whether it attracts allies or breeds, but
Hmm... What about the location and number?
It's the eastern forest. There are two of them. They
seem to just be prowling around for now.
The reward is 1G per creature. 2G for a successful
mission. In total, it's 4G. What do you say, want to
give it a try? \n< Guild master >
Hmm...I can't just let it go. I'll accept it. But I'll
If they say that the enemy is that vicious, I'd like
to investigate a little more about them.
Do you have any books or materials about them?
Even a report from a previous time would be fine.
Oh... I don't have the book, but there is someone in
town who is knowledgeable about that kind of thing.
His name is Tom, but everyone calls him the Monster
Doctor. Well, it's partly just teasing.
I think...he's the only person who are
knowledgeable about monsters in this town.
...The words don't seem to come out smoothly.
Tom is what you might call a weirdo. Sometimes I can't
It doesn't seem like he's a villain or heretic or
He must be a person who are not friendly.
Oh, well, maybe you actually get along better with him.
What does it mean? Well, never mind. I'm going to go.
Oh, I see. They say it's been popular lately. I
haven't seen it around here much though.
Don't you know about it? It's called the inheritance
"Oh, I'm in desperate need of money. If only my father-
in-law would pass away, I would inherit his fortune.
I received a report that there are some people who
plan to bring something into this town.
This is not suitable for our peaceful town.
So this is a request from the guild. Or rather, from
Should I just barge in and take down everyone on the
Oh, it's perfect for you. It's not even worth
washing, just a trifle. Please feel free to take
them down to your heart's content.
I don't mind, but if it's just those small fries, no
matter how many we crush, won't it only be a temporary
If you want to prevent the influx of poison, you must
cut it off at the source.
If we could do that, it wouldn't be a hassle. Well,
I will reward you with 4G. Will you take the job? \n< Guild master >
Thank you. This is the request form. It also has the

The location is off the eastern highway, so it's
The opponent is nothing special in terms of quantity

I suppose you judged that I am capable? Then leave it

The request isn't finished yet, right? Once you finish
I-I'll take on this request...this request.
Give me the documents. The request form... quickly!
You're usually calm, but upset now. Here, this is the
The client seems to be at the inn, so please ask them
Oh, thank you Master. I'll be going now!
I've got a clue! Finally, I've got a clue!
As I suspected, this is the right place. He said his
location was the inn. I must go and hear his story as
第一部最終依頼　導入
That idiot, she took on the request to subdue the

The woman that Erika saved came to deliver a message.
Helping this woman was the original purpose of the
If she got caught in exchange, then...
As adventurers, they may face situations like this.
That's why it's always a good idea to deposit money
with the guild, just in case they mess up.
If they don't come back, use this money to request
So, the client for this request is also Erika, right?
Enough with the preamble. Please tell me the
This request is different from before. We're dealing
with humans, and there are a lot of them.
Furthermore, we need to infiltrate that stronghold and
rescue hostages. Miss, you can't possibly do stealth
So that means you'll have to fight the band of thieves
They're rural thieves. Their equipment isn't anything
special, but still, a group of armed people is a
Even adventurers who have been trained and have
But Lady Erika went to fight. To save that woman.
Oh, she was stupid. She went there to help someone
I told her to abandon that woman.
Are you planning to say the same thing to me too?
Don't make that face, Master. The point is, as long as
I'm stronger than all the thieves, it doesn't matter.
If the request cannot be taken here, I will go on my
Then let me make this request again, this time from
You can leave it to me.
You're going to infiltrate the thieves' den. Of course,
you'll have to fight with them.
But going there is not an option. If there's a battle,
Erika will become a hostage, of course.
If it happens, no matter how strong you are,
So, securing Erika comes first. Head straight towards
Next, you'll take down the approaching thieves. If you
have to fight, this is the order.
The thieves have made the ruins in the middle of the
It's either an ancient temple or a fortress, but it's
The ruins are built as if carrying a steep cliff on
their back. The surrounding area is also hilly, giving
the impression of standing in a hollow.
This must be a natural fortress.
That's not such an impressive thing. It's just an
incline that you can easily climb by walking normally.
I think the reason why they're based here is mostly due
to the psychology of wanting to hide and stay
Is it rather convenient for the invading side?
I suppose so. Especially the cliff side is not well
guarded. This is Erika's estimation though.
Her plan was to quickly descend from the cliff using a
rope and infiltrate the building from the rooftop to
This rope is rigged with a pulley and a weight. When
you light the fuse from below, the weight that's fixed
up above falls and the rope rapidly winds up.
After rescuing the hostages, she was supposed to go
back up to the rooftop and use this mechanism to
escape all at once. Then, she flee to the city.
She could have entered the fort from anywhere around it,
but she went to the trouble of using the cliff.
It was supposed to catch the bandits off guard.
No, she didn't use it in the first place.
It seems that she noticed the woman being taken
outside and hastily took her back. According to the
Unexpected behavior. She thought it was a chance...
or maybe she just couldn't stand by and watch.
So the woman escaped, but she got caught.
Fortunately or unfortunately, thanks to that, the
entire strategy that Erika was supposed to use is
So the plan she made will save herself.
If we play our cards right, you should be able to
minimize your battles with the thieves.
That's all well and good, but from what I've heard, it
seems pretty elaborate... in other words, it appears
Is it possible that the rope was found and disposed of
Oh, of course that's possible. But in that case, you
That's correct. It was a foolish question.
We need to revise our strategy at that time. But for
now, let's continue with what we have.
The ruins are three levels in structure. However,
according to the woman, the first and third floors are
It seems that the thieves' sleeping quarters, the
storage of their loot, and the prison for holding women
they've captured are all located on the second floor.
Perhaps Erika is also trapped in this second floor
dungeon. However, it seems that even she doesn't have
a grasp on the structure of the building.
You need to actually infiltrate and search for the
That's all I need to know. Just enter from the
rooftop, move around the unmanned third floor, and
Ah, but even if you manage to find Erika successfully,
don't rush to go help her right away.
It's a common practice among thieves. There's always
one person whose role is to kill the hostages rather
So find that person first. You should be easy to spot
That's an odd way of putting it. Other thieves aren't
Thieves, robbers, rapists... Since coming to this
town, she has been taking down those kind of
There were also several requests involving
thieves. Even though it was a side job while
searching for the infamous monster,  the damage
dealt to those guys should have been considerable. \n< Guild master >
If they could capture Erika, we could find out what
those vengeful thieves are up to in the jail...
Are you saying they're torturing her to death...!
If they killed Erika, they would surely expose her
body as a warning in the fields.
Regardless of whether it hasn't happened yet, that
However, we should not expect much time for delay.
I have to head to the scene immediately.
Healing potions, bandages... Ah, all of these will
surely be necessary for Lady Erika.
What about this medicine? I've never seen this bottle
That's also for Erika. It's a powerful medicine, so
don't even think about drinking it by mistake. \n< Guild master >
Is it something like a clue? I understand. I'll keep
Ah, that's all I want to give you. The hideout of the
thieves' guild is quickest to reach by going straight
I see, understood. ...I will bring that meddlesome
第一部最終依頼　導入
If you're going to the hideout of the thieves' guild,
cut through the western forest and make sure to
prepare well as there will likely be multiple battles.

Do you know that adventurers were originally
It seems that the predecessor to the Adventurer's

It seems like the security in the eastern town is
Where people gather, money, illness, and crime come.
To a king who just sits on his throne, as long as he

parameters: There's nothing interesting here. Just chase
Goblin extermination? Oh, I see. You took on that

Take a bath as soon as you're done. They seriously

Have you seen any goblin children? I hope you have
They only produce sin and suffering as long as they
It is an act of mercy and virtue to dispose of them
ミノタウロスの探索進行中

依頼三つ終了・フリーモード進行中
Did you not find it strange that there were no
I take on everything one after another, so as soon as

第一部ラスト　冒険者の救助開始前
Did they catch the muscle gorilla?
Well, my condolences. Even if she's alive,

That's why us women have to be extremely cautious when
What's with that look? If a woman gets captured, you
know what happens to her, right? Just think about it.

events.name: 冒険者男
events.note: 冒険時の注意事項やらを教えてくれる

parameters: 宿を出てから道具屋に行くまで
Make sure to store items like potions in a convenient
If you plan to use them during battle, make sure to
utilize your slots. If you don't set them up before your
adventure, you won't be able to use them in an emergency.
ミノタウロスの探索進行中
In our guild, there was a blonde adventurer named
Ricott. Despite being a woman, she was surprisingly
She travels around on business and go on adventures here
and there, so she's a bit of a celebrity.
But just the other day, she fought and ended up dying
against a monster called Minotaur. It was in this
I often wonder what being an adventurer is all about.
No matter how strong you are, death can come in an
Looks like Erika and the Master have known each other
There must have been some connection through Ricott.
Well, it seems like neither of them wants to talk
妊婦の話後　後半依頼三つ進行中
As an adventurer, it's only natural to experience
failures. Actually, failures happen more often than
I heard that even top-notch adventurers have a success
We who are third-rate or lower are, of course, even
worse off. That means we have to think about how to
Even if you fail, life doesn't come to an end. It
won't end for you. Remember that well.
妊婦の話後　後半依頼三つ進行中
There are still few aggressive monsters around here.
It's thanks to the river to the east acting as a
Once you cross the river, it's like entering
a completely different world. The monsters
become ferocious, and the humans who fight
against them also become ferocious. \n< Adventurer >
They say that it's worth the effort because it keeps
work from being a problem, but personally, I prefer
taking it easy and living a simple life.
依頼三つ終了・フリーモード進行中
Thieves can generally be classified into three types:
former mercenaries, former nobles, and former
The thieves around here are former adventurers. Among
them are some pathetic ones who were expelled from the
However, humans become a threat just by gathering
together. This guild here is powerless against them.
The days where we have to wait with bated breath for
the feudal lord to come and subjugate them, huh.
第一部ラスト　冒険者の救助開始前
It seems like the lord has been having a tough time
lately. This thing called gold coins seems to be the
In the past, having abundant crops was the source of
the lord's power. But money doesn't grow in rice
paddies. It's not the lord's land.
The world's rules have changed from wheat to gold
So from now on, the aristocrats won't be the main
players anymore. It will be the merchants, the cities.
It's the era of what they call the third estate.
第一部ラスト　冒険者の救助開始後
Were you and Erika close friends?
Well, it may be useless advice, but I'll say it
An adventurer who cannot abandon their friends cannot
Our motto between us... Ah, I know, I know.
You don't want to hear it, right?
I have no business here. \n< Serena >
It's empty inside. I suppose they fill it with money

...Come to think of it, this bag itself must be worth
Perhaps the price of the bag has been deducted from

If you take this and go to the client's place, it will

After completing the task, we obtain the client's

Scroll... No, it's just a piece of paper.
It seems that you can use this to conveniently write
on the map here. Of course, it's not free.
He is taking out coins from inside and counting or
I feel like I shouldn't stare too much.
Delivery request to a distant place.
This is a request that I have no use for.
It seems that the Adventurer's Guild is organizing

This request has nothing to do with me in any way.
I don't know how long the exploration will take.
Babysitter. Someone with childbirth experience and

Detailed maps are classified as confidential for

It moves a little when I push.
It seems like it's empty inside.
I don't really like alcohol. It only makes me feel
I think it's great to have been born in a place with

Let's refrain from climbing over the counter.
I don't think I'll be scolded, but master will
